Virtual Product

Operations¶

The operations described here can be carried out on the basis of the product context. Right-click on the name of the product to reach the operations via the pop-up menu.

KPI Cockpit¶

This operation opens the KPI Cockpit for the product (see CONTACT Metrics application manual)

Product Overview¶

This operation opens a structure tree for the product.

Variant Editor¶

This operation opens the Variant Editor for the product (see also Chapter Variant Editor)

Create from Template¶

You can select a template to create a new product. To do so, use the Create from template pop-up menu operation. This way not only the product master data from the template is taken over, but also all defined elements of the virtual product model in the template, for example, the objects of variant management or the request catalog.

Import Image¶

A representative image can be assigned to a product. This is done with the Import image pop-up menu operation. The assigned image is displayed, for example, in the Variant Editor or Portfolio Navigator.

Copy¶

If a product is copied, the entire product model is copied along with it. Therefore, the requirements and the variant model of the copied product, among other specifications, are available in the new product. The product copy can be considered an ad hoc template of sorts. In contrast to the Create from template operation, a product is duplicate for a one-time procedure when copying a product.
